title: Arianna Huffington, Nighttime Routines & The Importance of Sleep | #AskGaryVee Episode 213
description:
Buy Arianna's book "The Sleep Revolution" here:
http://ariannahuffington.com/books/the-sleep-revolution-hc

#QOTD: When was it that you started thinking that sleep deprivation and burnout were the ways to succeed? And was there a moment when you woke up to that fact that that's not the truth?
